Saturday 1940
Went down and saw The Fighting 69th with Jimmy Cogney and Pat O'Brien. June came over with little Joe who has grown an awful lot.

Wednesday 1943
Didn't go to music lesson because of too much homework. Studied English all evening. Gram still in bed with Flu but is much better to-day.

Thursday 1944
Went to RoCoHo meeting at Marilyn Gilley's house. Our tea is shaping up nicely now. After the meeting Geri & I went down to Dr Penttands and stayed with Ann until 1AM. Wrote Butch long time. Gosh I'm tired!
